page.title: 18The Care of Pigs
page.content: The diseases that pigs get are pneumonia and swine fever.To treat the pigs they use injections.The vet comes only when needed or not very often.The piglets are kept warm by infa-red light.The piglets stay with the mother for four weeks.The life cycle of a pig is: piglet is born,piglet grows into pig,pig has piglets,pig turns into bacon,piglets grow up and so on.In the farrowing house there are farrowing pens with metal bars to make sure that the sow doesn't roll over onto the piglets and squash them.
